labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The emote picker displays it, but only in frequently used
data.expected_result: The emote doesn't show up in the emote picker
data.short_description: Emotes you don't have permission to use appear in frequently used
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you don't have permission to use external emotes - Open the emote picker - If a BTTV or subscriber emote is in your frequently used, click on it and send the message.
